mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.property_project_id AS "propertyProject.id", a.building_id AS "building.id", a.house_id AS "house.id", a.remittancer_id AS "remittancer.id", tr.user_name AS "remittancer.userName", tr.bank_account AS "remittancer.bankAccount", a.contract_code AS "contractCode", a.contract_name AS "contractName", a.effective_date AS "effectiveDate", a.first_remittance_date AS "firstRemittanceDate", a.remittance_date AS "remittanceDate", a.expired_date AS "expiredDate", a.contract_date AS "contractDate", a.deposit AS "deposit", a.contract_status AS "contractStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.LESSOR_NAME AS "lessorName", a.LESSOR_ID_NO AS "lessorIdNo", a.LESSOR_CELL_NO AS "lessorCellNo", at0.attachment_path as trusteeshipContr, at1.attachment_path as landlordId, at2.attachment_path as profile, at3.attachment_path as certificate, at4.attachment_path as relocation, tp.project_name as projectName, tb.building_name as buildingBame, th.house_no as houseNo, tr.user_name as remittancerName, a.month_space as "monthSpace"

left join t_attachment at0 on a.id=at0.lease_contract_id and at0.attachment_type='20' and at0.del_flag='0' left join t_attachment at1 on a.id=at1.lease_contract_id and at1.attachment_type='0' and at1.del_flag='0' left join t_attachment at2 on a.id=at2.lease_contract_id and at2.attachment_type='1' and at2.del_flag='0' left join t_attachment at3 on a.id=at3.lease_contract_id and at3.attachment_type='2' and at3.del_flag='0' left join t_attachment at4 on a.id=at4.lease_contract_id and at4.attachment_type='3' and at4.del_flag='0' left join t_property_project tp on a.property_project_id = tp.id left join t_building tb on a.building_id=tb.id left join t_house th on a.house_id=th.id left join t_remittancer tr on a.remittancer_id=tr.id and tr.del_flag='0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_lease_contract( id, property_project_id, building_id, house_id, remittancer_id, contract_code, contract_name, effective_date, first_remittance_date, remittance_date, expired_date, contract_date, deposit, contract_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, month_space ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{propertyProject.id}, #{building.id}, #{house.id}, #{remittancer.id}, #{contractCode}, #{contractName}, #{effectiveDate}, #{firstRemittanceDate}, #{remittanceDate}, #{expiredDate}, #{contractDate}, #{deposit}, #{contractStatus}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{monthSpace} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_lease_contract SET property_project_id = #{propertyProject.id}, building_id = #{building.id}, house_id = #{house.id}, remittancer_id = #{remittancer.id}, contract_code = #{contractCode}, contract_name = #{contractName}, effective_date = #{effectiveDate}, first_remittance_date = #{firstRemittanceDate}, remittance_date = #{remittanceDate}, expired_date = #{expiredDate}, contract_date = #{contractDate}, deposit = #{deposit}, contract_status = #{contractStatus}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, month_space = #{monthSpace} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.property_project_id AS "propertyProject.id", a.building_id AS "building.id", a.house_id AS "house.id", a.remittancer_id AS "remittancer.id", a.contract_code AS "contractCode", a.contract_name AS "contractName", a.effective_date AS "effectiveDate", a.first_remittance_date AS "firstRemittanceDate", a.remittance_date AS "remittanceDate", a.expired_date AS "expiredDate", a.contract_date AS "contractDate", a.deposit AS "deposit", a.contract_status AS "contractStatus", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM t_lease_contract a where a.del_flag = 0 and a.house_id = #{houseId}
